A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is number 8 in the Star Wars saga. While I enjoyed this movie I couldn't help feel that the Star Wars saga has become formulaic and repetitious.  This movie \"The Force Awakens\" seems to have similarities to \"The Empire Strikes Back\,\" the third movie which was number 6 if you follow the Star Wars chronology.  Even George Lucas and Mark Hamill have noted that this last series Disney has changed the trajectory of the story and are not following what Lucas had originally intended.  Nonetheless it does have good characters and surprises.
